name: NightERA Variable
description: A change to the NightERA theme allowing users to easily customize the entire site.
additional_info:
Version 4.3:
- Minor Fixes to things that were changed

Version 4.2:
- Themed all the new elements brought by the new Site update

Version 4.1:
- Figured out how to change the ERA Logo without losing the ability to click on it to take you the the frontpage
- Fixed Text Editor Hover Colours

Version 4.0.0:
- Refactored all my code to use Variables, meaning it's easier to edit the colour palettes as a whole now!
- Themed New Avatar Icon if you don't have an Avatar Set.
- Themed Poll Icon
Note: I'm looking into figuring out how to let you pick your own colour schemes using the built-in feature on this site, though you can edit the CSS & Adjust the Variables yourselves if you'd like.

Version 3.2.0:
- Yeah I found more missing stuff...
- Themed Image / Link Box
- Tweaked Linked text colour because it's hard to read.

Version 3.1.0:
- New blue coloured ResetERA logo!
- Blue loading animations!
- Edited staff posts to match colour palette
- This is possibly the final release unless I find anything missing

Version 3.0.0:
- New Colour palette; Site is now darker and more uniform!
- Thread Filter Plugin was tweaked, should be more uniform with the rest of the style now.

Version 2.1.0:
- Themed Thread Filter Panel
- Themed Poll section
- Themed VERAfied tag / Admin Tags

Version 2.0.1:
- Adds minor stuff I forgot (whoops)

Version 2.0.0:
- Completely redesigned to work with ResetERA 2.0
- New colour choices

Version 0.4.1:
- New Page Width settings causes a jump with the old implementation, so I removed the Width change

Version 0.4:
- Removed the Coloured border on the nav tabs on the top
- Removed the weird colouring / Box shadow behind Profile Pictures


Version 0.2.5:

- Forgot to add 1 tweak
- Fixed some minor edge cases in colouring


Version 0.2:

- Changed Text Selection Colouring
- Changed Background / Thread List Background Colours
- Removed Meme Icons for Hangouts
